title: Das Sonderangebot auf dem Spielplatz
translation: The youth play football on the field. Tom is Anna’s opponent. Suddenly, Tom’s battery is empty. He has to replace the battery. An advertisement helps with the decision. There is a special offer at the kiosk. Two batteries and a coin cost little. Tom buys the offer and throws the old battery in the trash. In the end, the youth look at the advertisement again and laugh.
